name: Blue Skies Aviation Oy
about: Blue Skies Aviation Oy, established in 2009, is a premier pilot academy in Finland dedicated to developing high-quality aviation training. Located at the Lahti-Vesivehmaa aerodrome in Asikkala, the academy offers training that meets the stringent requirements of the European Union Aviation Safety Agency (EASA). Our objective is to train skilled, alert pilots with a strong focus on safety and general aviation knowledge. We provide personalized, flexible services, including Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Night Rating, and Aerobatics qualification courses. Our unique winter flight courses offer an exhilarating experience amidst Finland’s beautiful winter landscapes. With a commitment to excellence and safety, Blue Skies Aviation Oy is Finland’s most diverse and reputable pilot academy.
services: ["Private pilot's license PPL(A)\nePPL Remote theory course\nLight Aircraft License LAPL(A)"]
